languages.text: "О Великий, ну почему ты послал мне законника с кодексом вместо сердца и глыбой вместо лица, а не еще одну прекрасную сестру? Я что, о многом прошу?"

traits.locale_text: "О Великий, ну почему ты послал мне законника с кодексом вместо сердца и глыбой вместо лица, а не еще одну прекрасную сестру? Я что, о многом прошу?"

languages.text: "Oh, Exalted One, why did You have to send me a lawman with a book for a heart and a rock for a face instead of another enchanting sister? Surely that isn't too much to ask?"
languages.original_text: "О Великий, ну почему ты послал мне законника с кодексом вместо сердца и глыбой вместо лица, а не еще одну прекрасную сестру? Я что, о многом прошу?"

"Oh, Exalted One, why did You have to send me a lawman with a book for a heart and a rock for a face instead of another enchanting sister? Surely that isn't too much to ask?"

"Oh, Exalted One, why did You have to send me a lawman with a book for a heart and a rock for a face instead of another enchanting sister? Surely that isn't too much to ask?"

languages.text: 「ああ、エグザルテッド・ワンよ、なぜアタシに送ってくれたのが、もう一人の魅惑的なシスターじゃなくて、心は書物で顔は岩のような法執行官なの？そんなに無理なお願いだった？」
languages.original_text: "Oh, Exalted One, why did You have to send me a lawman with a book for a heart and a rock for a face instead of another enchanting sister? Surely that isn't too much to ask?"

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、エグザルテッド・ワンよ、なぜアタシに送ってくれたのが、もう一人の魅惑的なシスターじゃなくて、心は書物で顔は岩のような法執行官なの？そんなに無理なお願いだった？」

languages.text: "Oh, Erhabener, warum musstet Ihr mir einen Mann des Gesetzes mit einem Buch als Herz und einem Stein als Gesicht schicken, statt eine weitere bezaubernde Schwester? Das ist doch gewiss nicht zu viel verlangt?"
languages.original_text: "Oh, Exalted One, why did You have to send me a lawman with a book for a heart and a rock for a face instead of another enchanting sister? Surely that isn't too much to ask?"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Erhabener, warum musstet Ihr mir einen Mann des Gesetzes mit einem Buch als Herz und einem Stein als Gesicht schicken, statt eine weitere bezaubernde Schwester? Das ist doch gewiss nicht zu viel verlangt?"

languages.text: « Ô Exalté, pourquoi a-t-il fallu que vous m'envoyiez un homme de loi avec un livre à la place du cœur et un visage de pierre à la place d'une autre sœur enchanteresse ? Ce n'était quand même pas trop demander, si ? »
languages.original_text: "Oh, Exalted One, why did You have to send me a lawman with a book for a heart and a rock for a face instead of another enchanting sister? Surely that isn't too much to ask?"

traits.locale_text: « Ô Exalté, pourquoi a-t-il fallu que vous m'envoyiez un homme de loi avec un livre à la place du cœur et un visage de pierre à la place d'une autre sœur enchanteresse ? Ce n'était quand même pas trop demander, si ? »

languages.text: «Oh, Exaltado, ¿por qué has tenido que enviarnos a un jurista con un libro por corazón y una roca por cara en vez de mandarnos a otra encantadora hermana? ¡Tampoco creo que fuese mucho pedir!».
languages.original_text: "Oh, Exalted One, why did You have to send me a lawman with a book for a heart and a rock for a face instead of another enchanting sister? Surely that isn't too much to ask?"

traits.locale_text: «Oh, Exaltado, ¿por qué has tenido que enviarnos a un jurista con un libro por corazón y una roca por cara en vez de mandarnos a otra encantadora hermana? ¡Tampoco creo que fuese mucho pedir!».

languages.text: “噢，至高无上的神皇啊，您为什么要派来一个整天绷着脸，只认死教条的法务官，不能派来另一位可爱迷人的修女呢？这个要求应该不算太过分吧？”
languages.original_text: "Oh, Exalted One, why did You have to send me a lawman with a book for a heart and a rock for a face instead of another enchanting sister? Surely that isn't too much to ask?"

traits.locale_text: “噢，至高无上的神皇啊，您为什么要派来一个整天绷着脸，只认死教条的法务官，不能派来另一位可爱迷人的修女呢？这个要求应该不算太过分吧？”

languages.text: "Ey Görkemli... Ne diye güzeller güzeli bir rahibe yerine yüreği kitaptan, yüzü taştan bir kanuncu gönderdin bana? Çok mu şey istiyorum?"
languages.original_text: "Oh, Exalted One, why did You have to send me a lawman with a book for a heart and a rock for a face instead of another enchanting sister? Surely that isn't too much to ask?"

traits.locale_text: "Ey Görkemli... Ne diye güzeller güzeli bir rahibe yerine yüreği kitaptan, yüzü taştan bir kanuncu gönderdin bana? Çok mu şey istiyorum?"

languages.original_text: "Oh, Exalted One, why did You have to send me a lawman with a book for a heart and a rock for a face instead of another enchanting sister? Surely that isn't too much to ask?"
